page.title: 13Satisfaction with life?
page.content:
Satisfaction with life in Fairweather Green was expressed by the majority of {a sample of 213 people.}Half of those surveyed use clubs or sports facilities in the area.About half also support local events such as galas,etc.Most people (80%) think there are enough Post Offices.The majority (66%) think that are enough bus services,doctors,shops and public houses.Among those surveyed only 17 people own a computer,60 own a car and there are 61 dogs,37 cats and 18 other pets.
{Places of interest:} { {Sam's Mill}- a 16th.century corn mill. {Chellow Dean Beck}- a local beauty spot,also called Jacky Beck. {Craven Heifer}- an old coaching inn on the road to Bingley.
